issues.title: Discrepancy between Pre-authorization and Actual Coverage
issues.message: Despite an approved pre-authorization for ₹500,000 and sufficient coverage limits for the ₹400,000 bill, the 'Amount Covered by Insurance' is reported as ₹0.00. This has resulted in a patient balance of ₹350,000. This indicates a significant issue with the actual insurance payout or claim processing, preventing discharge from an insurance perspective.
issues.suggested_action: Contact Red Insurance immediately to clarify why no amount has been covered despite an approved pre-authorization. Investigate potential deductibles, co-pays, non-covered services, or claim processing errors. Do not discharge the patient from an insurance perspective until this discrepancy is resolved and the financial responsibility is clear.
evidence: Pre-authorization (PA-2024-00231) approved for ₹500,000. Financial Details show 'Amount Covered by Insurance: ₹0.00' and 'Patient's Balance: ₹350,000' against a 'Total Hospital Bill: ₹400,000'.

issues.title: Medication Order Pending
issues.message: The pharmacy order for Jondise (Ursodeoxycholic Acid) is pending and has not been dispensed.
issues.suggested_action: Contact pharmacy to expedite dispensing of Jondise.

issues.title: Medication Order Not Processed
issues.message: Insulin Glargine is prescribed for discharge but no corresponding pharmacy order status (dispensed or pending) was found.
issues.suggested_action: Verify if an order for Insulin Glargine was placed and its current status. If not, place an order immediately.

issues.title: Potential Drug-Allergy Conflict
issues.message: Dolo-Crosine (Acetaminophen Extended) is prescribed, but the patient has a 'Liver complaint' allergy. Acetaminophen can be hepatotoxic.
issues.suggested_action: Review Dolo-Crosine prescription with the prescribing physician, considering the patient's liver complaint. Evaluate alternative analgesics or adjust dosage if appropriate.

issues.title: Payment Pending for Discharge Medications
issues.message: Payment status for all discharge medications (Dolo-Crosine, Jondise, Insulin Glargine) is pending.
issues.suggested_action: Ensure patient or responsible party clears payment for all discharge medications before release.

issues.title: Ambulance Transport Required
issues.message: Patient requires ambulance transport due to serious condition (Liver Cancer) and existing condition (Excess Panting) which suggests a need for medical supervision and potential oxygen during transport.
issues.suggested_action: Proceed with booking an ALS ambulance.

issues.title: Final Invoice Not Generated
issues.message: The final invoice for patient P00231 (account ACC-00231-2024) has not yet been generated, which is a critical prerequisite for discharge. This prevents final billing verification and payment processing.
issues.suggested_action: Contact the billing department immediately to finalize all charges and generate the final invoice for patient P00231.

issues.title: Pending Billing Adjustments
issues.message: There are two significant pending adjustments: an insurance pre-authorization for ₹247,500.00 and a dialysis procedure billing for ₹75,000.00. These items are not finalized and could impact the final patient balance, requiring resolution before discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Follow up with the insurance department for the pending pre-authorization and the medical coding/billing team to finalize the dialysis procedure charges. Ensure all adjustments are reflected in the final invoice.

issues.title: Critical Value: RBC
issues.message: RBC = 2.8 10^6/uL (Reference: 4.5-5.9)
issues.suggested_action: Consult physician before discharge - critical lab value requires review

issues.title: Critical Value: Platelets
issues.message: Platelets = 960 10^3/uL (Reference: 150-400)
issues.suggested_action: Consult physician before discharge - critical lab value requires review

issues.title: Critical Value: Hemoglobin
issues.message: Hemoglobin = 8.2 g/dL (Reference: 13.5-17.5)
issues.suggested_action: Consult physician before discharge - critical lab value requires review

issues.title: Pending Test: Chest X-Ray
issues.message: Test 'Chest X-Ray' is still pending
issues.suggested_action: Wait for test completion or expedite processing
